mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from ums_menu m left join ums_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join ums_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join ums_role r on r.role_id = ur.role_id where m.status = 0 and r.status = 0 and ur.user_id = #{userId}

select id, parent_id, perms, order_no, path, title, component, ignore_keep_alive, affix, icon, frame_src, transition_name, hide_breadcrumb, hide_children_in_menu, hide_tab, hide_menu, is_link, menu_type, is_frame from ums_menu m left join ums_role_menu urm on m.id = urm.menu_id left join ums_user_role uur on urm.role_id = uur.role_id left join ums_role ur on uur.role_id = ur.role_id left join ums_admin u on uur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in (0, 1) and m.status = 0 and ur.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_no
